mapper.insert: insert into member(name, login_id, pwd, gender, email, tel1, tel2, tel3) values(#{name}, #{loginId}, #{pwd}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{tel1}, #{tel2}, #{tel3})
mapper.select: select * from member where login_id = #{loginId} and pwd = #{pwd}
mapper.delete: delete from member where login_id = #{loginId} and pwd = #{pwd}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where login_id=#{loginId}
